Package sage.animation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimationController
    An AnimationController is a Controller for SceneNode elements (that is, nodes in the scenegraph) which are Joints that can be animated.
    AnimationKeyFrame
    An AnimationKeyFrame contains the data describing a single keyframe of an animation: rotation and translation transforms to be applied to an object (e.g.
    AnimationSequence
    An AnimationSequence holds a sequence of AnimationKeyFrames defining a particular animation.
    Joint
    Joint represents a joint in the animation skeleton for a model.
